summary: ComplaintTimeline UI component tested successfully. The component renders correctly in the OptimizationDetailDrawer, shows timeline events in chronological order (oldest first), displays summary stats (complaints, responses, resolved counts), and supports expand/collapse functionality for event details.

frontend_ui: ComplaintTimeline component renders correctly when optimization has complaints
Timeline shows events in chronological order (oldest first)
Summary stats at top show correct counts: Complaints, Responses, Resolved
Resolved badge shows X/Y format (e.g., '0/2 Resolved', '2/2 Resolved')
Average resolution time displayed when complaints are resolved
Timeline events are clickable and expand/collapse correctly
Expanded event details show: actor, timestamp, content, evidence links
Complaint Filed events show red marker with AlertTriangle icon
Team Response events show blue marker with MessageSquare icon
Resolved events show green marker with CheckCircle icon
Timeline event badges show complaint number and priority
Resolution time badge displayed for resolved events
OptimizationDetailDrawer opens and displays ComplaintTimeline section
Component properly returns null when no complaints/responses exist

features_verified.chronological_ordering: Events sorted oldest to newest (earliest complaint → responses → later complaints → resolutions)
event_types_displayed: COMPLAINT_CREATED - Red marker, shows reason, priority, responsible users
TEAM_RESPONSE - Blue marker, shows response note, report URLs
COMPLAINT_RESOLVED - Green marker, shows resolution note, resolution time
features_verified.expand_collapse: Each event clickable with ChevronUp/ChevronDown toggle

optimization_2.title: Tier 1 Backlink Purchase - Main Site Authority Boost

critical_code_review_comments: Component properly handles empty arrays - returns null when no complaints/responses
Timeline events correctly sorted by timestamp (oldest first)
Proper use of data-testid attributes for testing: complaint-timeline, timeline-event-{id}
Good accessibility with interactive expand/collapse and keyboard-friendly design
Minor: Console warnings about DialogTitle/DialogDescription in Radix UI dialogs should be addressed
seed_data_creation: No seed data created. Used existing optimizations with complaints in Test Network 152134.
context_for_next_testing_agent: ComplaintTimeline component is fully functional. Found in OptimizationDetailDrawer when viewing optimizations with complaints. Timeline displays events chronologically with colored markers (red=complaint filed, blue=team response, green=resolved). Each event expands on click to show details. Summary stats at top show counts. Component has proper data-testid attributes for automated testing.
console_warnings_noted: DialogContent requires a DialogTitle for accessibility (Radix UI warning)
Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent (Radix UI warning)
